ygData.subject: just a quick question about tactics
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, i tried to solo the warlord goblin in Runnyeye, however i pulled 1 elite with him as well...thanks to my jboots i got to the zone without damage. i
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
i tried to solo the warlord goblin in Runnyeye, however i pulled 1 elite
with him as well...thanks to my jboots i got to the zone without damage.

i then proceeded to beat up on the warlord as he was my original target.
but of course i was getting whacked by both elite and warlord at same
time. Now either i was unluckly or i am way under equipped (lvl 30, pgt
+ dirk, bronze armour) but i was whipped...i actually got the warlord to
run, and chased him a bit...but the elite was hitting me still, and i
just managed to zone without killing either with only 2 hps left.

so my question is this...should i have killed the elite first, which is
a green crit? or was staying on the warlord the best thing?

i guess it might depend on my ultimate goal...and my goal then was to
just kill the damn warlord...as i had to goto work in 5 mins...if i had
more time, maybe i should have killed elite, zoned to rest and gone back
for warlord...

But im getting off my question here...if solo, should you take out the
hardest crit first or weakest?

Dandrak, Karana (lvl 30)
